problem:
V = float(random.randrange(1,10,1)) v1 = (float(random.randrange(100,300,1))-200)/10 v2 = (float(random.randrange(100,300,1))-200)/10
v3 = V - v1 v4 = v2 - V v5 = v1 + v2 - V
In the circuit shown there are four unknown elements and an independent voltage source.
The strength of the source \(V=$V\)V is given. Also, there are two branch voltages measured: we know \(v_1=$v1\)V and \(v_2=$v2\)V.
what is the voltage \(v_3\)?
what is the voltage \(v_4\)?
what is the voltage \(v_5\)?
